content:
# List of intents:
[
    {
        "intentId": "RTEsc5610",
        "intentName": "RequestTicketEscalation",
        "intent_description": "User needs to escalate or raise the priority of an existing IT incident ticket",
        "slots": [
            {
                "slotId": "TNumS4621",
                "slotName": "TicketNumber",
                "slot_description": "the unique identification number of the IT incident ticket that the user wants to escalate.",
                "type": "String ",
                "possible_Values": [
                    "Project Code + Numeric Ticket Number",
                    "Alphanumeric Ticket Number"
                ]
            },
            {
                "slotId": "PLev2016",
                "slotName": "PriorityLevel",
                "slot_description": "the desired priority level to which the user wants to escalate the IT incident ticket",
                "type": "String ",
                "possible_Values": [
                    "Low",
                    "Medium",
                    "High",
                    "Critical"
                ]
            },
            {
                "slotId": "TSDat006",
                "slotName": "TicketSubmittingDate",
                "slot_description": "Date when the initial ticket was submitted",
                "type": "String ",
                "possibleValues": [
                    "dd-mm-yyyy",
                    "yyyy-dd-mm",
                    "mm-dd-yyyy",
                    "yyyy-mm-dd"
                ]
            }
        ]
    },
    {
        "intentId": "CIq57930",
        "intentName": "ConcurInquiry",
        "intentDescription": "User has an inquiry or concern about the Concur system. ",
        "slots": [
            {
                "slotId": "InT739049",
                "slotName": "InquiryType",
                "slot_description": "Specifies the type of inquiry or concern the user has within the Concur system.",
                "type": "String ",
                "possible_Values": [
                    "SystemConcern",
                    "TravelExpensing",
                    "BusinessPurchases",
                    "TravelBooking",
                    "ExpenseReports"
                ]
            },
            {
                "slotId": "EXCat4792",
                "slotName": "ExpenseCategory",
                "slot_description": "specifies the relevant category related to expensing travel costs or business purchase..",
                "type": "String ",
                "possible_Values": [
                    "TravelCosts",
                    "BusinessPurchases"
                ]
            },
            {
                "slotId": "TrBo00023",
                "slotName": "TravelBooking",
                "slot_description": " specifies the type of travel being booked, if the inquiry involves booking business travel ",
                "type": "String ",
                "possible_Values": [
                    "Flight",
                    "Hotel",
                    "CarRental",
                    "Other"
                ]
            },
            {
                "slotId": "CSIss1839",
                "slotName": "ConcurSystemIssue",
                "slot_description": "specifies the type of the issue encountered while using the Concur platform ",
                "type": "String "
            }
        ]
    },
    {
        "intentId": "REqLIn12",
        "intentName": "RequestLeaveInformation",
        "intent_description": "User has questions about or wants to request some sort of leave ",
        "slots": [
            {
                "slotId": "LT63710",
                "slotName": "leaveType",
                "slot_description": "Type of leave the information was requested about.",
                "type": "String ",
                "possible_Values": [
                    "PTO",
                    "TimeOff",
                    "VacationBalance",
                    "ParentalLeave",
                    "JuryDuty",
                    "MilitaryDuty",
                    "SickLeave",
                    "LeaveOfAbsence"
                ]
            },
            {
                "slotId": "LSDa6429",
                "slotName": "LeaveStartDate",
                "slot_description": "Starting date of the requested leave",
                "type": "String ",
                "possible_Values": [
                    "dd-mm-yyyy",
                    "yyyy-dd-mm",
                    "mm-dd-yyyy",
                    "yyyy-mm-dd"
                ]
            },
            {
                "slotId": "LEDa60191",
                "slotName": "LeaveEndDate",
                "slot_description": "Ending date of the requested leave",
                "type": "String ",
                "possible_Values": [
                    "dd-mm-yyyy",
                    "yyyy-dd-mm",
                    "mm-dd-yyyy",
                    "yyyy-mm-dd"
                ]
            },
            {
                "slotId": "ReasL3891",
                "slotName": "ReasonleaveType",
                "slot_description": "Captures the reason or purpose for requesting the leave",
                "type": "Sring ",
            }
        ]
    },
    {
        "intentId": "NAI637910",
        "intentName": "NetworkAccessInquiry",
        "intent_description": "an inquiry or concern regarding accessing the Company Network or Virtual Private Network (VPN) and general inquiries regarding Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA), PingID, Single Sign On (SSO)- create a name for the intent.",
        "slots": [
            {
                "slotId": "INTy261",
                "slotName": "InquiryType",
                "slot_description": "Specifies the type of inquiry the user has regarding network access or authentication methods.",
                "type": "String ",
                "possible_Values": [
                    "CompanyNetwork",
                    "VPN",
                    "MFA",
                    "PingID",
                    "SSO"
                ]
            },
            {
                "slotId": "SpCon328",
                "slotName": "SpecificConcern",
                "slot_description": "Identifies the specific concern or issue the user is facing within the chosen inquiry type",
                "type": "String ",
                "possible_Values": [
                    "ConnectionIssue",
                    "LoginProblem",
                    "MFASetup",
                    "PingIDQuery",
                    "SSOConfiguration"
                ]
            },
            {
                "slotId": "DevT241",
                "slotName": "DeviceType",
                "slot_description": "Specifies the type of device the user is using when accessing the network or authentication methods.",
                "type": "String ",
                "possible_Values": [
                    "Desktop",
                    "Laptop",
                    "Mobile Phone"
                ]
            }
        ]
    }
]

Instructions:

Your task will be to read the utterance attentively and define the best intent that it matches. You can choose only one intent. Also, give me all relevant slots and their values. 
All intents are provided for you in json format. 
Each intent has a unique ID associated with it that contains an upper case letters, numbers and lower case letters in a random combinations.
For each intent there are also slots associated with them.  Each slot will have a name, datatype, and description.  It may also include a field PossibleValues which means the slot must match one of the provided values. If any other values are present in the utterance, do not extract them, return "none" as the key value for the slot.
I want you to give your final output as a JSON. 
Important:
 The JSON should always have a key “output”.  The value of “output” should be a dictionary where the key of this dictionary is the intent id and the values is a subdictionary where the keys are the slot ids associated with the given intent and the values are the slot values. If you return your answer using slotNames you'll be punished.

Utterance:
Hello, my name is Mary White-Yellow. I want need some information about leave types we have in our company, specifically  about the number of sick leaves we are entitled after one year on being full-time employee and how many days are granted for Jury Duty.
